title: Uhhhhhhhhhh No?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
First you take out the ability to re-roll champion shards, 
Now even if there are champions you don't have... you still cant get a mystery champ...
So even if you've spent the last 6 years collecting every champ, there is no way to lessen the price for loyal players even a little?

I decidedly do not like this blue essence change.....

For the first time in history, I might just not even buy the new champ until their 
price goes down... 

which sucks because It has been ages since we had a mid laner and I have been really excited to play Zoe :/
